nodes.text: Curt Willham was a Human male smuggler who worked for the Black Sun on Coruscant. When the Justicars' Brigade paid the Black Sun money to smuggle Jedi artifacts offworld, Willham was one of the smugglers implanted with an artifact. Willham started hurting badly from the artifact inside of him, and was taken care of by Doctor Maer with the help of a Jedi Consular in the Silent Sun cantina.
